text: Volleyball at the Pacific Games (previously known as the South Pacific Games) has been played since 1963. ==Pacific Games== ===Men's tournament=== {|class=wikitable style="text-align:left" |- ! rowspan="2" width=25|Games !! rowspan="2" width=90|Year !! rowspan="2" width=100|Host city ! colspan="3"|Medals !!rowspan="2" style="padding:2px;"|Ref |- ! width=160|Gold !! width=160|Silver !! width=160|Bronze |- bgcolor=#ddeeff |align=center| I || 1963 | Suva | | | |align=center| |- |align=center|II || 1966 | Nouméa | | | |align=center| |- bgcolor=#ddeeff |align=center| III || 1969 | Port Moresby | | | |align=center| |- |align=center|IV || 1971 | Papeete | | | |align=center| |- bgcolor=#ddeeff |align=center| V || 1975 | Tumon | | | |align=center| |- |align=center| VI || 1979 | Suva | | | |align=center|Volleyball: men.
